tweet: That's why I introduced HR 1174, the Federal Firefighters Fairness Act. This legislation ensures the firefighters who risk their lives for our safety have access to the medical benefits they need. https://www.independent.com/2019/04/29/carbajal-introduces-bill-to-protect-firefighters/ …

Federal firefighters don't receive the same health protections as their CA counterparts even though they are subjected to the same workplace hazards, including lung disease & cancer.

These brave men & women risk their lives everyday to protect us–it's about time we protect them.

Thank you @AdyBarkan for coming to DC to testify for the first House Medicare For All hearing. I'm inspired by your unwavering dedication to enhancing & expanding healthcare for all.

I am so proud to represent you & the Central Coast!

Great meeting with members of VTC & AbilityOne last week in their Lompoc facility. I was inspired by their hard work to ensure disabled Americans have the opportunity to learn & grow in their careers & daily lives.

Thanks for making the Central Coast a more equitable place! pic.twitter.com/0szhbOCrdf

Hate has no place in our country. Deeply saddened by the shooting at Congregation Chabad during Passover. 

I stand w/ the Jewish community to renounce the disturbing rise of antisemitic rhetoric that leads to these deadly attacks. My thoughts are w/ the victims & their families.

Glad to see Plains All-American Pipeline was sentenced for their crimes that led to the Refugio State Beach oil spill, but no amount of fines can undo the damage to our wildlife.

Corporate greed should never outweigh the health & safety of our coast. https://www.sanluisobispo.com/news/local/environment/article229699179.html …

The Central Coast has faced the grave impacts from #climatechange for some time now–from droughts & nearly-year round fire seasons to the rising sea levels, we understand the increased urgency to protect our environment better than most.

We have 45 days to comment on the @BLMNational's proposal that endangers our coast. Make your voice heard by commenting on the link below by June 10th:

 https://eplanning.blm.gov/epl-front-office/eplanning/comments/commentSubmission.do?commentPeriodId=75786 …

The Trump Admin's plan to open public lands to fracking & oil drilling, despite grave warnings from our scientific community, is a step backward that we can't afford. I strongly oppose this plan & I'll continue fighting to protect our clean air, open spaces, & wildlife habitat.

104 years later, it is time for the US to recognize the #ArmenianGenocide & the unspeakable pain caused by the murder of 1.5 million Armenians.

I cosponsored H.Res. 296 to stand w/ the Armenian people calling for full recognition of this horrific violence & oppression.

When a fire breaks out it means all hands on deck – regardless of whether you are a federal or local firefighter. 

I introduced the Federal Firefighters Fairness Act, to provide federal #firefighters w/ the same disability presumptions as CA firefighters:  https://www.facebook.com/repsaludcarbajal/videos/2351319761811496/ …

Join me on Thursday, April 25th for a town hall meeting in Santa Barbara! I look forward to hearing about your priorities & providing an overview of what we've accomplished in the first 100 days of the 116th Congress.

Please RSVP to let me know if you'll be there!

Horrified by the murder of hundreds of Easter worshipers & tourists in #SriLanka during this sacred time for reflection & renewal. I strongly condemn these acts of terror. 

My thoughts are with all the victims & their families on this dark day.

No child should feel unsafe in their classroom.

My Extreme Risk Protection Order Act is one way we can prevent future tragedies by temporarily preventing individuals in crisis who are threatening violence from obtaining a firearm. #ERPOAct
20 years ago, 12 students lost their lives to senseless gun violence in Columbine, CO. Since then, more than 226k American students have experienced gun violence at school.

Calling all Central Coast high school artists! Congressional Art Competition submissions are due in one week.

Submit your artwork & fill out the form in the link by Thursday, April 25th for a chance to have your masterpiece featured in the U.S. Capitol.
 https://carbajal.house.gov/constituent-services/arts-competition.htm … pic.twitter.com/52M0Cte5ji

AG Barr's rosy analysis in both his press conference and report summary didn't accurately convey the evidence gathered by Mueller.
 
This report raises deep concern about the integrity of our elections, our national security vulnerabilities, and @POTUS’s conduct while in office.

Armed with this consensus, it is vital that we work to protect our elections and democratic institutions from information hacking and online disinformation attacks in the future. 

It worked for them last time and we can be certain they will try again.

I’m still reading through Special Counsel Mueller’s report, but there is one important fact that we can, and must all agree upon – the Russian government interfered in the 2016 election in substantive and systematic way.

Congratulations to Jeffrey Stewart on his 2019 Pulitzer Prize winning book, "The New Negro: The Life of Alain Locke."

Thanks for enriching the Central Coast & UCSB community by keeping the spirit of influential African-American artists like Locke alive. https://www.independent.com/2019/04/16/jeffrey-stewart-wins-pulitzer-prize/ …

From @CHISNPS to @YosemiteNPS, California is home to some of the most beautiful parks in the world. Celebrate National Park Week by exploring stunning @NatlParkService sites from 4/20-4/28.

Click the link to get adventure inspiration & #FindYourPark:

 https://prks.org/2Ui3tiw  pic.twitter.com/haB9PMXTLh

Days after his confirmation, @Interior Sec. Bernhardt is already under investigation for giving improper access to former clients in the oil & gas industry.

Disappointed the Senate did not vet him thoroughly before voting to confirm him as Secretary. https://www.washingtonpost.com/climate-environment/2019/04/15/interiors-watchdog-opens-an-ethics-probe-into-bernhardt-four-days-after-his-senate-confirmation/?utm_term=.f61527269722 …

.@HumaneSociety is a powerful voice for animals, working tirelessly to prevent unspeakable cruelty.

Happy to report back to Jeeps & Peeps (my two rescue cats) that I have received their Humane Advocate award, for my work to keep our animal friends free from abuse. pic.twitter.com/eiNrvCPXLI

Devastated to see the Notre Dame Cathedral – an enduring testament to human ingenuity & artistry – enveloped by flames today. My thoughts are with the people of France as they rebuild from the ashes. The world stands with you.

It was great to be part of the opening of Carp Connect & the Carpinteria Health Care Center last weekend. The center, which offers much-needed physical & mental health services, will expand access to health care for Central Coast residents.

Thanks for having me! pic.twitter.com/EzgerP3K6z

Honored to receive recognition from @MOAA for outstanding support of U.S. active duty, reserve, & retired military personnel & their families.

I am dedicated to supporting the courageous men & women who step up to devote their lives to protecting our nation. pic.twitter.com/sG5nuqoe5M

The Trump Admin's ban on transgender service members is disdainful & undermines our overall military readiness.

I stand with our brave trans patriots who have dedicated their lives serving our country & I will continue to #FightTheBan. pic.twitter.com/Uw78lVwLyn

From his deep ties to the oil & gas industry to his numerous ethics scandals, we cannot trust David Bernhardt to protect the best interest of our public lands as @Interior Secretary.

I strongly oppose his nomination.

#NetNeutrality strengthens competition, holds internet service providers accountable & ensures the internet is free from throttling.

Today, I proudly voted to pass the #SaveTheNet Act, a bipartisan bill to make the internet an even playing field for all consumers. pic.twitter.com/PU1udhD1so

Thank you @RepBrownley, @RepKatieHill, @RepJimmyPanetta, @RepJudyChu & @RepHuffman for sending a strong message that CA's public land & national monuments are not for sale.

We will not stand idly by as this Admin attempts to open them up to oil & gas drilling. #CentralCoastWild

Today, I'm reintroducing the Central Coast Heritage Protection Act w/ @SenKamalaHarris to designate 250k acres of public land as wilderness - the highest form of protection possible - to safeguard the open spaces we cherish. https://carbajal.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=512 …

Over the weekend, we hiked together in the @LosPadresNF & discussed the importance of protecting public lands for future generations. #CentralCoastWild https://lompocrecord.com/news/local/carbajal-leads-hike-to-announce-legislation-creating-new-wilderness-area/article_b5c09b97-be25-5140-a84c-c59036397ade.html …

Today, I attended a hearing on improving our roadways to better understand the role Congress can play in ensuring the safety of American roads.

Watch my remarks below: https://youtu.be/R4qSw2auLro?t=3846 …

Investing in our highways is vital to the safety of our communities – too many lives are lost due to unsafe roads.

From updating infrastructure to incorporating new safety technology in our vehicles, Congress must take concrete steps to improve the conditions of our roads.

Enhancing the local economy as well as supporting small owners & entrepreneurs on the Central Coast continues to be one of my top priorities.

Honored to receive the @USChamber’s "Spirit of Enterprise" Award. pic.twitter.com/DwTpmPnJyl

I'd like to thank Noah's Anchorage Homeless Foster Youth Shelter for hosting me on Friday & for the important work they do to get young Americans back on their feet. 

Teenagers should be focused on their ambitions & future, not where their next meal is coming from. pic.twitter.com/EPBHIhIFTU

Over the past seven decades, NATO has brought nations together to advance security, peace, & stability throughout the world.
 
I stand firm in my commitment to NATO & promoting global peace through this transatlantic partnership. #NATO70

It was an honor welcoming #NATO Secretary General @JensStoltenberg before Congress earlier this week as we celebrated the 70th anniversary of one of history's most successful political alliances.
 
The Secretary General reaffirmed the importance of this critical alliance.

Head Start is an important investment in Central Coast families–they ensure each child has access to a high-quality preschool education.
 
I was a family services advocate for Head Start early in my career & will continue advocating for these successful early education programs. https://twitter.com/NatlHeadStart/status/1113804928512819200 …

Great hearing from officers w/ @PORACalifornia about ways that we can continue to support our brave law enforcement officers & ensure they have the resources they need to keep the Central Coast safe. pic.twitter.com/3hZxYCl8tz

#VAWA19 includes vital programs that safeguard Americans from gender-based violence & help empower those who have experienced it.

Sad to see the NRA’s stranglehold prevent many of my Republican colleagues from voting to safeguard Americans from intimate partner violence.

1-in-4 women experience severe intimate partner violence, & 1-in-7 have been stalked by an intimate partner – this is an epidemic. Today, the House finally voted to reauthorize Violence Against Women Act after Republicans let it expire last year. #VAWA

From unique cultural & academic perspectives to economic growth, international students contribute a great deal to our communities.
 
To the 5k+ international students who currently enrich the Central Coast–you are appreciated & #YouAreWelcomeHere.

These brave service members put their lives & education on hold to serve our nation. I was honored to present them w/ a Special Congressional Recognition as they received their high school diplomas.

Congratulations graduates & thank you for your service! http://www.santaynezvalleystar.com/decades-later-local-veterans-get-their-diplomas/ …

Actually, I have visited the Alamogordo @CBP facility in New Mexico where 8yo Felipe Alonzo was held before he died in custody.

I’ve seen the inhumane facilities firsthand & spoken w/ our border patrol agents directly about their needs for more resources, not more costly walls. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1113091756130742273 …
It was a powerful reminder of how grateful I am to live in a country where an immigrant, & the son of a farmworker, has the opportunity to serve his community in this remarkable institution.

A bit of a surreal experience presiding over debate today in the House on Dems' efforts to lower healthcare costs & defend access to care for those with preexisting conditions. #ProtectOurCare pic.twitter.com/tE86GStcxs

Great Cesar Chavez Day spent at the first ever Open Streets event in Santa Maria! I left this landmark event encouraged by my conversations with many of you that Cesar Chavez's compassion for others & dynamic civic engagement is alive & well in our community. pic.twitter.com/76fUea9A1Y

Diverting $3.6 billion of these crucial funds to build a wall for a non-military emergency is irresponsible & detrimental to the well-being of our troops.
